name: Apparitions of Our Lady of Zeitoun
summary: Between April 2, 1968 and May 29, 1971, the Blessed Virgin Mary appeared on the dome of St. Mary's Coptic Orthodox Church in Zeitoun, a suburb of Cairo, Egypt. The apparitions were witnessed by hundreds of thousands of people, including Muslims and Christians, and were photographed and documented. Our Lady appeared as a luminous figure, sometimes holding the Christ Child, and was seen performing gestures of blessing. The apparitions were recognized by the Coptic Orthodox Church and drew international attention, with many conversions and healings reported.
